short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to check if a website uses Klaviyo and stores the results in Google Sheets.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Klaviyo Checker is a simple and powerful tool that allows you to quickly verify if a website is using Klaviyo for email marketing. Yyou can instantly find out if Klaviyo is implemented on any website, making it easy for marketers to track which platforms are leveraging Klaviyo.
